hero.title: Your AI Partner for Embedded Development
hero.subtitle: EmcoderCLI is a command-line AI assistant for STM32/ESP32 developers, providing intelligent assistance from code generation to firmware flashing

smart.title: Truly Understands Embedded
smart.desc: Not just code generation — understands register configs, peripheral dependencies, and hardware constraints

safe.title: Safe & Controllable
safe.desc: CubeMX project protection ensures your code is never overwritten

fast.title: Ready Out of the Box
fast.desc: Just pip install and start — no complex configuration needed

open.title: Open Source
open.desc: Fully open source, community-driven, continuously evolving

platforms.title: Supported Platforms
platforms.desc: Deeply optimized for mainstream MCU platforms

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.desc: Install EmcoderCLI now and experience AI-powered embedded development

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.welcome: Hi! I'm the EmcoderCLI AI assistant. I can help you generate code, debug hardware, and manage projects. Describe your needs.
chat.disclaimer: AI-generated content is for reference only. Please verify code correctness and safety before use.

changelog.title: Changelog

what.a: EmcoderCLI is a command-line AI assistant for embedded MCU developers, providing code generation, project management, firmware flashing, and hardware debugging.

platforms.a: Currently supports the full STM32 series and ESP32 series, with more platforms being added continuously.

free.a: EmcoderCLI core features are completely free and open source. You can freely use and contribute.

install.a: Use pip install emcoder-cli to install. Requires Python 3.10+ environment.

offline.a: Some features (project management, flashing) work offline. AI chat and code generation require network connectivity.

notFound.message: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist
